name: B. Game of Robots
statement:
In late autumn evening robots gathered in the cheerful company of
friends. Each robot has a unique identifier an integer from to .At some
moment, robots decided to play the game "Snowball". Below there are the
rules of this game. First, all robots stand in a row. Then the first
robot says his identifier. After that the second robot says the
identifier of the first robot and then says his own identifier. Then the
third robot says the identifier of the first robot, then says the
identifier of the second robot and after that says his own. This process
continues from left to right until the -th robot says his
identifier.Your task is to determine the -th identifier to be
pronounced.
